subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: JUPITER, Fla. (AP) — As the Florida Marlins took batting practice before an intrasquad game, the music over the stadium public-address system featured crooners from the 1950s, creating a mellow soundtrack that agitated the players.
snippet: JUPITER, Fla. (AP) — As the Florida Marlins took batting practice before an intrasquad game, the music over the stadium public-address system featured crooners from the 1950s, creating a mellow soundtrack that agitated the players.
